title: akhilANDeshvari durusuga
sahitya:
akhilANDEshvari durusuga brOvumu


anupallavi

  nikhila tApahAriNi bhuvilOna ninu mincina vArevarunnArammA


caraNam 1    mANikyamayamaiyunna mandira madhya vAsinI alivENI 
shrI shambhunAthuni rANI varamIyavE gIrvANI mAyammA
    caraNam 2    ambOruha sambhava harishankara akhila munIndra pUjitA ati 
gambhIrA dInarakSaNI gadA nA moralanu vinalEdA
    caraNam 3    O ambA ninu nammina nApai inta parAmugamEla vinu 
shyAmakrSNutA cinta dIrci sAmrAjyamIyavE vEgamE
